metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Golden Brown is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Golden Brown has sections analyzed in the following keys: B♭ Minor,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
